Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near Wells/53rd
ShortDescription: SB 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via: Wells, I-94 Expwy, Garfield and Wells, due to, street blockage, near Wells/53rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
